meanings.definition: Constituting number eighty in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The eightieth day of school was a special celebration.
meanings.sent2: She received a gift on her eightieth birthday.
meanings.sent3: The eightieth cupcake in the row was decorated with sparkles.
meanings.sent4: His eightieth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The eightieth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: The cake was divided into an eightieth for each guest.
meanings.sent2: He ate one eightieth of the pizza.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant carried an eightieth of the leaf back to its nest.
meanings.sent4: She won an eightieth of the total prize money.
meanings.sent5: The farmer planted an eightieth of his field with corn.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number of eighty in counting order.
meanings.sent1: Her birthday falls on the eightieth of the year.
meanings.sent2: He was the eightieth person in line to buy tickets.
meanings.sent3: The eightieth student to arrive got the last available seat.
meanings.sent4: She finished the race in the eightieth position.
meanings.sent5: The eightieth page of the book contained a surprising twist.
